title: "Genius NY finalists will work to pursue funding at pitch night in October"
excerpt: "Five companies are now working toward making their final pitch in October for big prize money in the fifth year of the state’s Genius NY program. Empire State Development (ESD) on Aug. 17 announced the five teams selected to take part in round five of the business-accelerator program at CenterState CEO’s Tech Garden in Syracuse."
